Kabar Desa Siluman, Jokowi : Usut dan Tangkap !
06 Nov 2019, 16:08 by Rini Hairani


Kabar Desa Siluman, Jokowi : Usut dan Tangkap !

KBRN,  Jakarta : Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) angkat bicara tentang adanya kabar tentang desa fiktif atau desa 'siluman' untuk mendapatkan anggaran dana desa dari pemerintah pusat.
Menurut Jokowi,  fenomena desa fiktif atau desa siluman itu bisa terjadi, mengingat sulitnya negara dalam mengelola sebanyak 74.800 desa di seluruh Indonesia. 
"Negara kita memang negara yg besar. 514 kabupaten dan kota ini gede. 74,800 desa ini juga banyak. Manajemen mengelola desa sebanyak itu tidak mudah," kata Jokowi kepada wartawan usai pembukaan 'Konstruksi Indonesia 2019' di JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Rabu (06/11/2019).Kepala Negara pun menginstruksikan jajarannya agar mengungkap keberadaan desa yang diduga fiktif." Tetap kita kejar agar yang namanya desa-desa tadi diperkirakan, diduga itu fiktif ketemu, ketangkep yah," tegas Jokowi. "Tetapi kalau informasi benar ada desa siluman itu mungkin hanya desanya hanya pakai plang saja tapi desanya nggak (ada) bisa saja terjadi, karena sekali lagi dari Sabang sampai Merauke, dari Miangas sampai Pulau Rote adalah sebuah pengelolaan yang tidak mudah," tambahnya.Adanya istilah desa fiktif atau desa 'siluman' sebelumnya diungkap Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati dalam Rapat Kerja dengan Komisi XI DPR di Gedung DPR, Jakarta, Senin (04/11/2019).Menurut Srimul, pemerintah akan melakukan verifikasi ke lapangan karena dilaporkan masih banyaknya desa tertinggal saat anggaran dana desa dari pemerintah pusat terus meningkat dari tahun ke tahun.Sri mengatakan, saat ini, setidaknya masih ada 20 ribu desa yang masuk dalam kategori tertinggal. Berdasarkan banyak masukan dari berbagai pihak, penyebabnya adalah bermunculan desa fiktif."Sekarang, muncul desa-desa baru yang bahkan tidak ada penduduknya," ungkap Srimul. Desa fiktif tersebut muncul hanya untuk mendapatkan dana desa yang sudah rutin dianggarkan pemerintah pusat setiap tahun sejak 2015. Anggarannya pun terus meningkat dari waktu ke waktu, yaitu dari Rp 47 triliun pada 2016 menjadi Rp 70 triliun di tahun ini.Mengutip data dari Kementerian Desa, Pembangunan Daerah Tertinggal dan Transmigrasi (PDTT), setidaknya terdapat 74.579 desa di Indonesia pada tahun ini. Dengan pagu anggaran dana desa dalam APBN 2019 sebesar Rp 70 triliun, artinya tiap desa mendapatkan rata-rata Rp 938 juta pada 2019.Dalam Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Negara (APBN) 2020, pemerintah sudah membuat anggaran lebih besar untuk dana desa, yakni Rp 72 triliun. Dengan besarnya anggaran ini, Sri berharap, kementerian/lembaga terkait untuk bersama-sama melakukan tindakan pengawasan lebih ketat."Kita juga ingin melakukan verifikasi terhadap munculnya fenomena tersebut," tutur Sri.Sri menyebutkan, pihaknya baru mendengar fenomena desa fiktif setelah pembentukan Kabinet Indonesia Maju pada dua pekan lalu. Ia memastikan, pemerintah, terutama melalui Kementerian Dalam Negeri, akan segera melakukan inevstigasi. (RH)

Village News Siluman, Jokowi: Investigate and Catch!
Nov 6, 2019, 16:08 by Rini Hairani


Village News Siluman, Jokowi: Investigate and Catch!

KBRN, Jakarta: President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) spoke about the news about fictitious or 'stealth' villages to get village budget funds from the central government.
According to Jokowi, the phenomenon of fictitious villages or stealth villages could occur, given the difficulty of the state in managing as many as 74,800 villages throughout Indonesia.
"Our country is indeed a big country. 514 districts and cities are big. 74,800 villages are also many. Management of managing that many villages is not easy," Jokowi told reporters after the opening of 'Indonesian Construction 2019' at JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Wednesday (06 / 11/2019).Kepala Negara also instructed its staff to reveal the existence of villages that were suspected to be fictitious. "We continue to pursue them so that the names of the villages were estimated, it was suspected that they were fictitiously met, arrested," Jokowi stressed. "But if the information is true there is a stealth village, maybe the village only uses signposts, but the village does not (it can) happen, because once again from Sabang to Merauke, from Miangas to Rote Island is an easy management," he added. the term fictitious village or 'siluman' village was previously revealed by Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati in a Working Meeting with the House Commission XI at the Parliament Building, Jakarta, Monday (04/11/2019). According to Srimul, the government will verify the field because there are still many reports underdeveloped villages when the village budget from the central government continues to increase from year to year. Sri said, at present, at least 20 thousand villages are included in the category of underdeveloped. Based on many inputs from various parties, the cause is the emergence of fictitious villages. "Now, new villages are emerging that even have no inhabitants," said Srimul. The fictitious village appears only to get village funds that have been routinely budgeted by the central government every year since 2015. The budget continues to increase from time to time, from Rp. 47 trillion in 2016 to Rp. 70 trillion this year. Citing data from the Ministry of Villages, Underdeveloped Regions and Transmigration (PDTT), there are at least 74,579 villages in Indonesia this year. With the budget ceiling of the village funds in the 2019 APBN of Rp 70 trillion, meaning that each village gets an average of Rp 938 million in 2019. In the 2020 State Budget and Expenditure (APBN), the government has made a larger budget for village funds, which is Rp 72 trillion. With this large budget, Sri hopes that the relevant ministries / institutions will jointly conduct more stringent surveillance measures. "We also want to verify the emergence of this phenomenon," said Sri. Sri said, it only heard the phenomenon of fictitious villages after the formation of the Indonesian Cabinet. Forward two weeks ago. He ensured that the government, especially through the Ministry of the Interior, would immediately investigate. (RH)
